title: Splash Tribe at The Palawan @ Sentosa
blurb: A fuss-free day out with distinct lounging areas.
description: Splash Tribe offers a daycation destination with various amenities and refreshments. It features pools suitable for all ages, including kids-friendly pools and an infinity-edge pool by the beach. Guests can also relax in exclusive two-storey gazebos with views of the pools and beach, adding a touch of exclusivity to their visit. Enjoy a splashing good time with family and friends at this vibrant destination. The venue provides a range of options for relaxation and recreation, ensuring a memorable experience for all visitors. With its thoughtful amenities and diverse pool options, Splash Tribe is an ideal spot for a family day out.

title: Splash Tribe at The Palawan Sentosa - Dining
blurb: Enjoy delicious fare and vibrant concoctions poolside.
description: Splash Tribe offers a delightful dining experience with a variety of food and beverage options designed to complement poolside enjoyment. The menu includes crowd-pleasing dishes and refreshing drinks suitable for families and kids. Food highlights feature Garlic Marinated Prawn Flatbread, Duck Lettuce Wraps, Tataki Salmon Bowl, and Tomato & Burrata. Beverage options range from Signature Tiki Cocktails to delightful milkshakes and mocktails. With options for both adults and children, Splash Tribe provides a relaxed and enjoyable dining atmosphere for all ages. The venue is perfect for families looking to unwind and indulge in tasty treats while enjoying the pool.

title: HydroDash
blurb: Dive into a water adventure at HydroDash!
description: HydroDash is Singapore’s first and only floating aqua park. It features inflatable obstacles for all ages. Participants can dash, slide, leap, and repeat. HydroDash is returning on 14 February 2025 and offers a fun water adventure for families and friends. It's a great place for kids and adults to challenge themselves and enjoy the water. The park is designed with different difficulty levels, making it suitable for both beginners and experienced adventurers. The aqua park provides a safe and exciting environment for everyone to enjoy a day out in the sun.

title: Splash Tribe at The Palawan @ Sentosa Information
blurb: Fun for all ages with pools and waterslides!
description: Splash Tribe welcomes guests of all ages. Children under 1.3 metres must wear life jackets when using the pool, except the waterslides. Life jackets are available at the towel stand. Children must be accompanied by an adult at all times in the pool. Swim diapers are mandatory for children 4 years old and below. Diapers are available for purchase onsite. Pool pollution is strictly prohibited, and guests found polluting the pool will incur a cleaning fee. Contact us for reservation amendments.
Keyword_tag: water park, swimming pool, waterslides, family fun, kids activities
full_address: 54 Palawan Beach Walk, The Palawan @ Sentosa, 098233
